attributes.action: MAKE CAMERON, send the British public LEAVE-EU Referendum leaflets.
attributes.additional_details:
MAKE CAMERON send the British public LEAVE-EU Referendum leaflets as he sent out STAY-EU Leaflets, so everyone has a clear picture of why we should leave or stay. Make it more fair to the Leave-EU supporter's!

Prime Minister, David Cameron plans to send the British public a pro-EU document to every household in the United Kingdom in the run up to the EU referendum. We believe voters deserve a fair referendum - biased interceptions by the Government.

More details:
We, the petitioners, demand the Government STOPS being biased, to keep Britain inside the European Union.

The Great British Public have waited since 1975 for a vote on our relationship with Brussels. We should be told both sides of the story and not just a campaign literature to keep Britan inside the EU.
attributes.background: MAKE CAMERON send the British public LEAVE-EU Referendum leaflets as he sent out STAY-EU Leaflets, so everyone has a clear picture of why we should leave or stay. Make it more fair to the leave EU supporters!
